UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Enhanced antimicrobial activity of novel synthetic peptides derived from vejovine and hadrurin.
Literature.Author: Sánchez-Vásquez L, Silva-Sanchez J, Jiménez-Vargas JM, Rodríguez-Romero A, Muñoz-Garay C, Rodríguez MC, Gurrola GB, Possani LD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µM),Escherichia coli 170(MIC=>50µM),Enterobacter cloacae 2524(MIC=>50µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 913(MIC=>50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 4677(MIC=>50µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>50µM)
